extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Just further down here and you will be back in \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Si vous allez plus bas, vous serez de retour à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Nice! I certainly don't miss being stuck in one place.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Cool ! Ça ne me manque pas de rester coincé toujours au même endroit.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh, and just so you are aware...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh, et juste pour que vous le sachiez...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: For now we have decided to limit access to Homestedt to selected players only.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pour le moment, nous avons décidé de restreindre l'accès à \v[area.evo-village.name] seulement à certains joueurs.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: After all, this place is supposed to give you a bit of privacy.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Après tout, cet endroit est censé être un peu un lieu privé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Right.\. I'd hate to wake up with dozens of random players squatting in my house.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est sûr.\. J'ai absolument pas envie de me réveiller avec un tas de joueurs qui squattent chez moi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Exactly.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Parfaitement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Now, one last thing!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon, une dernière chose !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You both get an access pass to the whole city of Rhombus Square!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Vous deux avez maintenant un passe d'accès à la ville entière de \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Full Rhombus Pass
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Passe de Rhombus Entier

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh, that's neat!\. I never bothered to get that one myself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh, c'est cool !\. Je n'ai jamais pris la peine d'en prendre un moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And yes...\. That is pretty much all!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et oui...\. C'est à peu près tout !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thanks!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Great!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Super !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What exactly are we supposed to do now?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Qu'est-ce qu'on est censé faire maintenant ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well...\. for now you simply can take your time to get used to your new life as Evotars.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et bien...\. pour l'instant vous pouvez prendre votre temps et vous habituer à votre nouvelle vie en tant qu'Évotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That's fair...\. but like...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, bien sûr...\. mais...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What exactly is our point in being in this game?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est quoi exactement notre but dans ce jeu ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I suppose there is new content that is left for us to play but once that is done?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'imagine qu'il nous reste du nouveau contenu à jouer, mais une fois que c'est terminé ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well....
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et bien...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let me just say that there are already plans about your future role in CrossWorlds.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je peux déjà vous dire qu'il y a déjà des projets pour votre futur rôle dans CrossWorlds.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But I will have to get back to you about that soon.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais je devrais vous reparler de cela bientôt.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Some details still need to be decided.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il faut encore que l'on se décide sur certains détails.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Uhm... okay, I guess?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Euh... oui, j'imagine ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Don't worry, Luke!\. There is something else for you to do!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, Luke !\. Il y a autre chose que tu peux faire !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: For you as well, Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pour toi aussi, Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let's meet up at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] to discuss the details!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Allons nous retrouver au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] pour discuter des détails !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You can drop by right away once you're ready!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Vous pouvez venir dès que vous serez prêts !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Sounds good!\. I'll be there, soon.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ça me va !\. Je vous rejoindrai, bientôt.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Great! We gotta go now.\. See you soon, then!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Super ! Il faut qu'on y aille maintenant.\. À bientôt, alors !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye, bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye, bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Later!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À plus !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let me know when you want to hang out, you two!\. I've got time today!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Dites-le-moi si vous voulez trainer un peu !\. J'ai du temps aujourd'hui !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Until then!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À plus !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Now if you'll excuse me, I'll have to take a closer look at that yard of mine!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Maintenant, si tu peux m'excuser, j'aimerais bien jeter un coup d'œil à mon propre jardin !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well then, I will log out as well now.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon, alors moi-aussi je vais me déconnecter.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: However, I can still contact you directly exactly how things used to be!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais je peux encore te contacter directement comme autrefois !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What?\. It is the most efficient way to communicate.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Quoi ?\. C'est le moyen le plus efficace pour communiquer.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Anyway, I have to go.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: En tout cas, il faut que j'y aille.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Until then, Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À plus tard, Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Logout
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Déconnexion

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Finally back to the Playground! When ready go to the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] to participate in a meeting.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Enfin revenu sur le Terrain de Jeu ! Une fois prêt, allez au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] pour participer à une réunion.
